description.value:
Trigger A creature steps on the floor or places pressure on the walls or ceiling of these two adjoining halls

Effect Silver blades erupt from the walls and wildly slash everything in the area, dealing @Damage[(2d10+13)[slashing]|traits:magical|options:damage:material:silver,area-damage] damage (magic, silver) to all creatures in the area (@Check[reflex|dc:30|basic] save). The trap then rolls initiative.

details.description: Pressure plates in the floor, wall, and ceiling of this hall trigger silver blades to protrude from the ceiling, slashing anything passing through the hall.
details.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:28] (master) to disable the pressure plates; two successes are required to disable the trap

publication.title: Pathfinder #215: To Blot Out the Sun

details.reset: The trap deactivates after 1 minute and can be manually reset.
details.routine: (2 actions) The maze of blades continues to spin, jab, and slash, dealing @Damage[(2d10+13)[slashing]|traits:magical|options:damage:material:silver,area-damage] damage (magic, silver) to all creatures in the area (@Check[reflex|dc:28|basic] save).
